content: inspired by the garter rib baby blanket by orange flower 1 in addition to the main garter rib a seed stitch border and a cable pattern along each of the long sides of the blanket were added once the pattern is established the basic knit is based on a 2 row repeat with the cables crossing every 10th row this makes it easy to memorize without getting boring **pattern style** written instructions chart and diagram 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/garter-rib-baby-blanket
